org.drip.analytics.curve

Class FXBasis

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.analytics.core.Serializer
      • org.drip.analytics.curve.FXBasis

  • public class FXBasis
extends Serializer
    This class implements the FXBasis curve representing term structure of FX basis. Basis can be full or bootstrapped.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.drip.analytics.core.Serializer

        throws java.lang.Exception
        Constructs an FXBasis instance from the currency pair, FX Spot, and FX basis parameters
        Parameters:
        cp - Currency Pair
        dtSpot - Spot Date
        dblFXSpot - FX Spot
        adblDate - Array of dates
        adblFXBasis - Array of FX Basis
        bIsFXBasisBootstrapped - True if the inputs are for bootstrapped FX basis

        dcNum - Discount Curve Numerator
        dcDenom - Discount Curve Numerator
        bBasisOnDenom - True if the basis is on the denominator
